summary: Finally, something that I have been waiting for a long time

description: To say as the full explanation of 'Kubernetes' that it "works as a Kubernetes worker" is self-referential. It says only that it "is what it is" without giving the reader any concept of its functionality. As a note to all developers, if you can't be bothered describing what something ACTUALLY DOES, just don't bother writing the software!
summary: Failed to explain what package does!
